long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Importing with Ease

Easily add content from web pages into Visallo with a click. Choose a case and a work product, then start your investigation.

High-Fidelity Imports

The import includes a high-resolution screenshot, and the entire HTML page and resources such as images, some linked audio and video. Those external resources are automatically linked to existing entities should they be shared across pages.
